title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: The first Combo does not take focus when clicked on. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: The first Combo should take focus when clicked on.
SR: When the first Combo is clicked on, it should take focus as expected.
